quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. – Confucius
Act as if it were impossible to fail. – Dorothea Brande
I know but one freedom and that is the freedom of the mind. – Antoine de Saint-Exupery
There are two mistakes one can make along the road to truth: not going all the way, and not starting. -Budda
Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace. – Dalai Lama
Work is not always required. There is such a thing as sacred idleness. – George MacDonald
Let the mind come as it wants; just you don’t go with it. The greatest salesman in the world cannot sell you if you don’t buy. – Mooji
Be the master OF mind rather than mastered BY mind. – Japanese Proverb
Even in the midst of disturbance, the stillness of the mind can offer sanctuary. – Stephen Richards
